senselogic.sitevision.api.metadata.value

Interface RelatedValue


  • public interface RelatedValue
    A temporary representation of a related metadata value.

    An instance of this interface can be used in MetadataUtil when setting a related metadata via the MetadataUtil.setMetadataPropertyValue(javax.jcr.Node, String, Object) or MetadataUtil.setMetadataPropertyValue(javax.jcr.Node, javax.jcr.Property, Object)

    An instance of the Sitevision class implementing this interface can be obtained via RelatedValueBuilder.build(). See RelatedValueBuilder for how to obtain an instance of the RelatedValueBuilder interface.

    Since:
    Sitevision 3.6
    Author:
    Magnus LÃ¶vgren
    See Also:
    RelatedValueBuilder

Sitevision - Portal and Content Management Made Easy
Sitevision is an advanced Java enterprise portal product and a portlet container (JSR 286) that implements Java Content Repository (JSR 283).
